data.title: WKMG-TV sports director David Pingalore
data.text:
David Pingalore was a neighbor of mine up in Olmsted Falls, OH while he worked for the CBS affiliate in Cleveland. Seemed like a really good guy. Definitely not the type to make up a story to grab attention. I'm sure Meyer is still denying the report simply out of respect for Luke Fickell. I guess we'll find out soon enough.

[quote id="6731125"]David Pingalore was a neighbor of mine up in Olmsted Falls, OH while he worked for the CBS affiliate in Cleveland. Seemed like a really good guy. Definitely not the type to make up a story to grab attention. I'm sure Meyer is still denying the report simply out of respect for Luke Fickell. I guess we'll find out soon enough. [/quote]You don't explain what David Pingalore has to do with anything.

He's the sports director for WKMG-TV in Orlando. They were the first too report that Urban has agreed to 7 yr 46 million dollar deal. All of this was according to his sources.

[quote id="6734534"]He's the sports director for WKMG-TV in Orlando. They were the first too report that Urban has agreed to 7 yr 46 million dollar deal. All of this was according to his sources. [/quote]That number keeps going up, first it was $35 million, then 36, then 40 and now 46? Urban will be a very rich guy.

[quote id="6734552"]That number keeps going up, first it was $35 million, then 36, then 40 and now 46? Urban will be a very rich guy.[/quote]Wait......You're not really Urban??? Lol

[quote id="6734552"]That number keeps going up, first it was $35 million, then 36, then 40 and now 46? Urban will be a very rich guy. [/quote]Interest!
